mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_no customerNo, c.customer_id customerId, cd.customer_name customerName FROM customer c INNER JOIN customer_detail cd ON c.customer_no = cd.customer_no WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId} AND c.customer_pw = PASSWORD(#{customerPw}) AND c.customer_active = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{idCk} AND customer_active = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND customer_pw = PASSWORD(#{customerPw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_detail( customer_no, customer_name, customer_gender, customer_phone, customer_address, customer_email )VALUES( #{customerNo}, #{customerName}, #{customerGender}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerAddress}, #{customerEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_no customerNo, c.customer_id customerId, cd.customer_name customerName, cd.customer_gender customerGender, cd.customer_height customerHeight, cd.customer_weight customerWeight, cd.customer_phone customerPhone, cd.customer_address customerAddress, cd.customer_email customerEmail, cd.customer_membership_end customerMembershipEnd FROM customer c INNER JOIN customer_detail cd ON c.customer_no = cd.customer_no WHERE c.customer_no = #{customerNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_detail SET customer_name = #{customerName}, customer_height = #{customerHeight}, customer_weight = #{customerWeight}, customer_phone = #{customerPhone}, customer_address = #{customerAddress}, customer_email = #{customerEmail}, updatedate = now() WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
UPDATE customer SET customer_pw = PASSWORD(#{newCustomerPw}), updatedate = now() WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND customer_pw = PASSWORD(#{customerPw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_img ( customer_no, customer_img_origin_name, customer_img_file_name, customer_img_size, customer_img_type )VALUES( #{customerNo}, #{customerImgOriginName}, #{customerImgFileName}, #{customerImgSize}, #{customerImgType} )
